snippet.title: Little Learning Machines - Demo out on Steam now!
snippet.description:
The wait is over. The Little Learning Machines demo is out now and don’t forget to Wishlist on Steam ✨
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1993710?utm_source=Youtube&utm_campaign=February

*Train Little Learning Machines with Love – then watch them come to life!*

Inspire, train, and customize artificially intelligent machines and set them loose in a cute, cozy world full of endless possibilities! Smart, soothing, and totally adorable – Little Learning Machines lets you take the incredible power of Reinforcement Learning into your own hands!
